name: Dead Cells - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Music For Your Headless Self.


This is the Dead Cells Ost. From the game. There’s like songs with guitar, and songs without. Sometimes with other instruments. Like voices, from the past, but now in the future, which is the present.
There’s sounds from a cat purring too, hidden somewhere.

This full length soundtrack will enhance your ears with subtle epic music to lead you to a never-ending world of fantastic fantasy. Now you can be the cool kid in the neighborhood, and go slash slash roll all the way into the sunset, while jogging.

For Human and cat use ONLY.

All Jokes aside...

This is a work in progress OST for Dead Cells, that's to say there are currently 16 tracks totaling a little over an hours worth of music. As we add levels to the game and therefore new tracks, we'll add them here for free!

Here's the track list:
  • The prisoners cells
  • The promenade of the condemned
  • The ramparts
  • The black bridge
  • The Fog Fjord
  • The stilt village
  • The graveyard
  • The crypt
  • The beholder
  • The dark crypt
  • The sewers
  • The toxic swers
  • The ossuary
  • The merchant
  • The chests
  • The challenges
  • The trailer
  • The other trailer

short_description: This is a work in progress OST for Dead Cells, that's to say there are currently 16 tracks totaling a little over an hours worth of music. As we add levels to the game and therefore new tracks, we'll add them here for free! Enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Whatever
  • Processor: Not a potato
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not a potato
  • Additional Notes: It's a soundtrack, if you can play an MP3, your computer will be ok...
